testcase.name: The distanceDriven method returns 0 on a new car
The batteryDrained method returns true when battery completely drained after driving
The batteryDrained method returns false when nitro car never drove
The batteryDrained method returns false when car never drove
The canFinishRace method returns false when car just cannot finish a race
The distanceDriven method returns 5 after driving once
The canFinishRace method returns true when car can finish a race
The distanceDriven method returns the correct distance after driving multiple times
The batteryDrained method returns false when nitro battery did not completely drain after driving
The canFinishRace method returns true when car can just finish a race
The distanceDriven method returns the correct distance after driving a nitro car
The batteryDrained method returns false when there's not enough battery
The batteryDrained method returns true when nitro battery completely drained after driving
The distanceDriven method returns 0 on a new nitro car
The canFinishRace method returns false when car cannot finish a race
The batteryDrained method returns false when car battery did not completely drain after driving
